title: WATCH:  Aquarium welcomes first rockhopper penguin chick in 8 years
description: It's weigh-in time for a new penguin chick born at Chicago's Shedd Aquarium, the first southern rockhopper penguin chick hatched at the aquarium in eight years.

title: DeSantis weighs media strategy shift as donors fret about early struggles: Sources
description: Only seven weeks into his 2024 campaign for the White House, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis is looking into a possible media strategy reset, according to sources.

title: WATCH:  Puppies and mini pigs become newfound friends
description: These goldendoodle puppies are free to play and roam with other animals on this Alabama farm.

title: WATCH:  Watch this baby snow leopard get burped like a baby
description: Tanganyika Wildlife Park in Kansas posted this video of a baby snow leopard being burped on TikTok, where it received over 26 million views.

title: WATCH:  Video of injured dog learning to trust vet goes viral
description: Veterinarian Dr. Thomas Hamilton shared a video on TikTok of one of his patients adorably cooperating with him despite hurting her dewclaw. The video has over 4.5 million views on TikTok.

title: SAG-AFTRA national board votes to approve strike
description: The national board of the Screen Actors Guild-American Federation of Television and Radio Artists voted Thursday to go on strike, officials of the union said.

title: Pittsburgh synagogue mass shooter eligible for death penalty, jury finds
description: Convicted Pittsburgh synagogue shooter Robert Bowers is eligible for the death penalty, a federal jury decided Thursday.

title: Average long-term US mortgage rate surged to nearly 7% this week, highest in months
description: The average long-term U.S. mortgage rate climbed this week to just under 7%, the highest level since November and the latest setback for homebuyers already grappling with a tough housing market constrained by a dearth of homes for sale

title: Hungary slams hefty fine on bookstore chain over LGBTQ+ graphic novel
description: A government office in Hungary has levied a hefty fine against a national bookseller for violating a contentious law that prohibits the depiction of homosexuality to minors

title: Chicago aquarium welcomes its first rockhopper penguin chick in 8 years
description: Chicago's Shedd Aquarium has welcomed the first southern rockhopper penguin chick to join its colony in eight years

title: Aid groups seek an EU commission review of migration law in Italy as it impounds rescue ships
description: A coalition of humanitarian groups is formally asking the European Commission to review Italian legislation governing migration

title: Judge rules man accused of trying to open jet's door, attacking crew, not competent for trial
description: A federal magistrate judge has ruled that a man charged with attacking a flight attendant with a broken metal spoon and attempting to open an airliner’s emergency door on a cross-country flight in March is not currently competent to stand trial

title: Serial rape suspect ordered to pay $50,000 additional bail
description: Former Boston attorney Matthew Nilo was ordered to pay $50,000 in additional bail. He was formally charged with additional counts in connection with decades-old cases.

title: Elon Musk launches AI company to compete with ChatGPT
description: Elon Musk has previously criticized the pace and ambitions of advances in AI.

title: Fire kills nearly every animal at Florida wildlife center
description: An early morning fire has killed multiple animals at a wildlife center in Florida

title: Gymnast Gabby Douglas confirms she's returning to compete in 2024
description: Douglas was the first African American to take home Olympics individual all-around gymnastics gold.

title: Secret Service ends investigation into cocaine found in White House
description: The Secret Service has been investigating since the drug was found near a visitor entrance on July 2.

title: Tornado touches down near Chicago's O'Hare airport amid extreme weather nationwide
description: One of the tornadoes touched down near Chicago's O'Hare International Airport on Wednesday evening, according to the National Weather Service.

title: Larry Nassar stabbed after allegedly making comment on women while watching Wimbledon
description: Larry Nassar was stabbed in prison after a comment he allegedly made while watching Wimbledon with other inmates, according to sources familiar with the case.

title: Founder of cryptocurrency lending platform Celsius Network arrested
description: Alexander Mashinsky founded Celsius in 2018.

title: US wholesale prices for June point to further easing of inflation pressures
description: Wholesale prices in the United States decelerated again last month, the latest sign that inflationary pressures are easing in the face of the Federal Reserve’s streak of interest rate hikes

title: FDA approves 1st birth control pill for use without prescription
description: The FDA approved Thursday the first birth control pill in the U.S. that can be sold without a prescription.

title: Brawl erupts in Kosovo parliament during PM's speech on defusing tensions with Serbs
description: A brawl has erupted in the Kosovo parliament after an opposition lawmaker threw water on Prime Minister Albin Kurti while he was speaking about government measures to defuse tensions with ethnic Serbs in the country's north

title: Delta puts up record quarterly numbers as travel surges
description: Delta Air Lines reported unprecedented quarterly profit and revenue and raised its expectations for a year after travelers took to the skies in huge numbers, defying some forecasts of a pullback in spending

title: 3 ‘heavily decomposed’ bodies discovered at remote wilderness campsite
description: Three “heavily decomposed” bodies have been found at a remote campsite and police are trying to figure out who they were and how long they might have been there for.

title: WATCH:  North Korean TV shows video of latest ICBM launch
description: North Korea's state-run television broadcast video of the country's latest test launch of its intercontinental ballistic missile, the Hwasong-18.

title: Kevin Spacey testifies in his own defense in his sexual assault trial in London
description: Kevin Spacey has begun testifying in his sexual assault trial at a London court

title: WATCH:  Passengers in awe as flight detours close to Icelandic volcano
description: The flight from New York to Reykjavik flew over the Fagradalsfjall volcano erupting in Iceland.

title: Influencer arrested over TikTok video satirizing wealthy Emiratis in Dubai
description: The arrests shows limits on freedoms in the UAE.

title: Sheep herder awoken and viciously attacked by bear in middle of the night
description: A sheep herder has survived after a bear woke him up and viciously attacked him in the middle of the night, authorities say.

title: Two hospitalized, buildings damaged in Kyiv by Russian drone strike overnight
description: Ukraine air defenses have shot down 20 Iranian-made drones fired by Russia mostly at the Kyiv region

title: Biden is closing out his Europe trip by showcasing new NATO member Finland
description: Biden will close out his five-day trip to Europe on Thursday.

title: The US House majority is in play next year after a weak GOP midterm showing
description: It follows an anemic showing by Republicans in the midterm elections.

title: 2 suspects sought after alleged abduction attempt of 14-year-old at mall, police say
description: Authorities in Pennsylvania are searching for two suspects after an alleged attempted kidnapping of a 14-year-old took place at the Willow Grove Mall.

title: Demolition of Idaho murders home paused amid discovery of asbestos and lead
description: Plans to demolish the house where four Idaho college students were slain have been halted til October.

title: Loved ones of Buffalo massacre victims sue social media, gun and body armor companies
description: Loved ones of those those murdered in the 2022 racially motivated mass shooting at a Buffalo grocery store filed what their lawyers described as a "landmark" lawsuit.
